entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -21.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pickle Lake Airport 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -21.5°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -25.9°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
